description.narrative: Technical Assistance, which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, children and adolescents, especially the most disadvantaged, benefit from a social protection framework, and monitoring and evaluation systems to improve public policies and social investment and reduce inequity gaps.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Through advocacy and technical assistance, the component contributed across the CPD to the design and approval of the first ever Comprehensive Early Childhood National Strategy. In 2021, UNICEF’s advocacy and technical assistance was crucial to promote an acknowledgement and continuity of the Strategy and to develop specific ECD policies in 4 provinces.Capacity-building efforts continued, aimed at reaching 3,000 caregivers to address socio-emotional effects of COVID-19 and generating technical inputs to scale-up to other provinces.The CO strengthened its comprehensive approach to FFPs including CSOs, the public and private sector as key actors to change social norms and family-leave legislation. | Status:Met | As-of Date:28/07/2021
